  1.   2.   3.   4.   5.   6.   7.   8. 

Our volumetric automatic dough divider rounder is ones on the best in the
market. It is very precise, strong and reliable, made with care and high
-quality mechanical and electrical parts.  
2400 pieces per hour or 40 strokes per minute.

The Automatic Divider with Rounding Mechanism is a high-performance, precise,
and reliable machine designed for efficient dough division. Built with high-
quality components, it operates at 230/400 V and 50/60 Hz. The machine
features a unique piston-based dividing principle and a closed-loop oiling
system. It can produce up to 2,400 pieces per hour and includes a 50 Kg hopper
with a safety system. Optional add-ons include a speed variator, varying
hopper capacities, and motorized weight regulation, making it a versatile
choice for any bakery.

BROCHURE DOWNLOAD

~~14.450 EUR~~ 9.500EUR

__ Automatic Dough Divider Rounder quantity __

Add to cart

## Additional information

Weight | 630 kg  
---|---  
Dimensions | 185 × 80 × 160 cm  
EAN: 2000000091235

The Automatic Divider with Rounding Mechanism is a top-of-the-line, high-
performance machine designed for precise and efficient dough division.
Operating at a voltage of 230/400 V and a frequency of 50/60 Hz, this machine
is built with high-quality mechanical and electrical components, ensuring its
strength and reliability. It can handle dough with a water content ranging
between 50% and 65%, and offers a programmable piece counter for added
convenience. The machine features a closed-loop oiling system with minimal
consumption—approximately 1 liter for every 10 working hours—and ensures a
maximum weighing error of 2% for unfermented fresh dough.

#### Unique Features

  * **Dividing Principle** : A piston suctions the dough from the hopper, ensuring constant and precise weight along with gentle dough treatment.
  * **Performance** : Capable of producing 2,400 pieces per hour or 40 strokes per minute at maximum speed.
  * **Safety** : Includes a 50 Kg hopper with a safety system.
  * **Mechanic Sprinkler** : For added functionality.

#### Optional Equipment

  * Speed Variator for adjustable operation.
  * Hoppers with varying capacities: 80, 100, 150, 200 L.
  * Reinforced Industrial Mechanism for enhanced durability.  To work with hard dough . Able to run 22h non-stop.
  * Electrical Flour Duster for efficient flour distribution.
  * Remote control for easy operation.
  * Motorized digital weight regulation.
  * Exit Conveyor belt with an independent motor, allowing for the possibility of doubling the maximum weight.
  * Motorized flour sifter.

#### Technical Specifications

  * **Dimensions** : Length 1,850 mm, Width 800 mm.
  * **Productivity** : 2,400 pieces per hour or 40 strokes per minute.
  * **Power** : 1.5 Kw.
  * **Weight** : 630 Kg.

Our volumetric dough divider with rounding mechanism is ones of the best in
the market providing high performance. It is very precise, strong and
reliable, made with care and high-quality mechanical and electrical
components. The dividing principle consists of a piston that suctions the
dough from the hopper ensuring a constant and precise weight and delicate
dough treatment.  
2400 pieces per hour or 40 strokes per minute at maximum speed.

# Multiple Piston Automatic Industrial Dough Divider Rounder

Sale!

  1.   2.   3.   4.   5.   6. 

  
Multiple Piston Industrial Dough Divider Rounder made in Spain 2/3/4 PISTONS.
Up to 9600 Pieces per hour with our 4 Piston Industrial Dough Divider Rounder.
Ready to work  more than 2 shifts per day.

The 4-Piston Divider is an industrial-grade dough dividing machine capable of
operating non-stop for over 22 hours. With a performance range of up to 9,600
pieces per hour and a weight range of 25-200 grams, this machine is both
versatile and efficient. It features a unique piston-based dividing principle,
an industrial oiling pump, and an independent exit belt for accuracy. Optional
add-ons include varying hopper capacities and motorized weight regulation.
Comes with a 2-year warranty and lifetime online support.

Given your interest in automatic machines and the automatization industry, the
4-Piston Divider would be an invaluable addition to your bakery or food
processing unit, offering high performance, reliability, and precision.

~~48.000 EUR~~ 31.980EUR

__ Multiple Piston Automatic Industrial Dough Divider Rounder quantity __

Add to cart

## Additional information

Weight | 990 kg  
---|---  
Dimensions | 230 × 100 × 170 cm  
EAN: 2000000086323

Our Multiple Piston Divider can have 2, 3 or 4 pistons and can produce up to
9600 pieces per hour.  
It is ones of the best in the market and perfectioned in over 40 years of
experience; It provides high performance and is very precise, strong, and
reliable, made with care and high-quality mechanical and electrical
components. The dividing principle consists of a piston that suctions the
dough from the hopper ensuring a constant and precise weight and delicate
dough treatment.  
Made to work industrially over 22 hours per day non-stop.  
Best price in the Spanish market! 2 years warranty. Lifetime online support

The 4-Piston Divider is a highly advanced dough dividing machine, perfected
over 40 years of experience. It is designed for industrial use and can operate
non-stop for over 22 hours per day. With dimensions of 3000 x 1370 x 1665 mm
and a 50 Kg hopper, this machine is both robust and reliable.

#### Unique Features

  * **Dividing Principle** : Utilizes a piston system that suctions dough from the hopper, ensuring constant and precise weight and gentle dough treatment.
  * **Performance** : Capable of producing up to 4,800 pieces per hour, with the option to extend to 9,600 pieces per hour with multiple pistons.
  * **Weight Range** : Can handle dough pieces ranging from 25 grams to 200 grams.
  * **Long Rounding Table** : For better balling of the dough.
  * **Industrial Oiling Pump** : Comes with a perfect greasing system for smooth operation.
  * **Independent Exit Belt** : For perfect adjustment and accuracy.

#### Optional Equipment

  * Hoppers with varying capacities: 80, 100, 150, 200 L.
  * Electrical Flour Duster for efficient flour distribution.
  * Remote control for easy operation.
  * Motorized digital weight regulation.
  * Exit Conveyor belt with an independent motor, allowing for the possibility of doubling the maximum weight.
  * Motorized Flour Duster for enhanced functionality.

#### Warranty and Support

  * Best price in the Spanish market.
  * Comes with a 2-year warranty and lifetime online support.

  * Ciabattera Roll 800 Plus - Automatic Ciabatta Machine
